devdoc.author: Parthib Datta  The system is designed to be as minimal as possible, and have the tokens maintain a (1/2 of Price of ETH) token == Price of ETH peg at all times. This is a stablecoin with the properties: - Exogenously Collateralized - ETH Pegged - Algorithmically Stable It is similar to DAI if DAI had no governance, no fees, and was backed by only ETH.

params.amount: : The Amount of ETH you want to redeem in Gwei

devdoc.title: nUSDEngine

deposite().notice: The amount of ETH you want to deposit

userdoc.notice: This contract is the core of the Decentralized Stablecoin system. It handles all the logic for minting and redeeming DSC, as well as depositing and withdrawing collateral.  This contract is just the ERC20 implementation of our stablecoin system
